Posts.Content: I went for a standard mamo today. they started the test by taking some basic shots (not under compression) to let the dr see before they did the compression xrays, but after her reviewed they came back in and took one more shot of my left breast (not under compression) and said that is all he needed. should i be concerned?
Posts.Title: Second Call back On Mammogram and scared

Posts.Content: I went for a standard mamo friday. they started the test by taking some basic shots (not under compression) the tech said she would let the rad. review before they took the compression with implant displacement xrays, but after the rad. reviewed the tech came back in and took one more shot of my left breast (not under compression) and said that is all he needed. should i be concerned? i have had several Mamograms before and all were done with the compression & displacement views.
Posts.Title: MAMOGRAM TEST
